      • buildLocalDateTime

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime buildLocalDateTime​(java.time.LocalDate appointmentDate,
                                                         java.lang.String hour,
                                                         java.lang.String min)
        Takes LocalDate object and two String params to build a LocalDateTime object.
        Parameters:
        appointmentDate - LocalDate object to combine with hour and minute strings.
        hour - String representing hour to be used.
        min - String representing minute to be used.
        Returns:
        Returns LocalDateTime combining appointmentDate with inputted hour and minute.

      • startBeforeEnd

        public static java.lang.Boolean startBeforeEnd​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                               java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Determines if one LocalDateTime object comes before or after the other.
        Parameters:
        start - LocalDateTime of appointment start time.
        end - LocalDateTime of appointment end time.
        Returns:
        Returns true if inputted start time is before the end time, false if not.

      • isOpenHours

        public static java.lang.Boolean isOpenHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                            java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Determines if start and end LocalDateTime objects are within opening hour constraints.
        Parameters:
        start - LocalDateTime of appointment start time.
        end - LocalDateTime of appointment end time.
        Returns:
        Returns true if appointment start and end times are within opening hour constraints, false if not.

      • isUpcoming

        public static java.lang.Boolean isUpcoming​(java.lang.String utcStartString)
        Determines if an appointment is within 15 minutes of current time.
        Parameters:
        utcStartString - String representing UTC time of appointment.
        Returns:
        Returns true if appointment is within 15 minutes of current time.
